GITHUB_BASE_PATH.description: path to dir to add markdown file on GitHub repo (empty means root)

GITHUB_FILENAME_BY_TITLE.description: if want to use post title instead of post number as markdown filename, set "yes" or some truthy value

ESA_DISABLE_DEFAULT_FRONTMATTER.description: if want to prevent prepending the default frontmatter to markdown file content, set "yes" or some truthy value
